name: Dicey Puzzles (BluEagle)
description:
Project Made for the GMTK GameJam.

I will continue making this into a full game after the jam! :D

Idea of the game:

YOU are the dice, you must attempt to Roll YOURSELF in order to complete certain actions. Whichever side is up determines what gets activated. For instance if the Blue side of your Dice is facing up, that will make any object marked Blue activate!

Because of the limited time of the jam, i didn't have time for any visuals. But i will add them!

Be sure to follow this game because the next update is gonna be BIG! :D

Open the Pause Menu using [Esc] for in-game controls!

Controls:

Move: W,A,S,D

Jump: Space

Camera: Mouse

Reset Dice: R

Rotate Dice: Hold right click (this will also stop it from moving)

Toggle cursor lock: L
